spells.name: Blink
spells.description: You randomly vanish and reappear for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Charm Monster
spells.description: Makes monster believe it is your ally.

spells.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
spells.description: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.description: Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Crushing Despair
spells.description: Subjects take -2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

spells.name: Cure Serious Wounds
spells.description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

spells.name: Daylight
spells.description: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

spells.name: Deep Slumber
spells.description: Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

spells.name: Displacement
spells.description: Attacks miss subject 50% of the time.

spells.name: Fear
spells.description: Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.description: Subject becomes insubstantial and can fly slowly.

spells.name: Geas, Lesser
spells.description: Commands subject of 7 HD or less.

spells.name: Glibness
spells.description: You gain +20 bonus on Bluff checks, and your lies can escape magical discernment.

spells.name: Good Hope
spells.description: Subjects gain +2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

spells.name: Haste
spells.description: One creature/level moves faster, receives +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.

spells.name: Illusory Script
spells.description: Only select creatures can read text.

spells.name: Invisibility Sphere
spells.description: Makes everyone within 10 feet invisible.

spells.name: Major Image
spells.description: As silent image, plus sound, smell, and thermal effects.

spells.name: Phantom Steed
spells.description: Magic horse appears for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.description: Frees object or person from curse.

spells.name: Scrying
spells.description: Spies on subject from a distance.

spells.name: Sculpt Sound
spells.description: Creates new sounds or changes existing ones into new sounds.

spells.name: Secret Page
spells.description: Changes one page to hide its real content.

spells.name: See Invisibility
spells.description: Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

spells.name: Sepia Snake Sigil
spells.description: Creates a snake-shaped text symbol that immobilizes reader.

spells.name: Slow
spells.description: One subject/level takes only one action/round, -1 to AC, Reflex saves, and attack rolls.

spells.name: Speak with Animals
spells.description: You can communicate with animals.

spells.name: Summon Monster III
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Tiny Hut
spells.description: Creates shelter for 10 creatures.
